participant_1.background:
I am busy working with publishers but I make time for my family.
I am a little light for my age, but I am growing well.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

participant_2.background:
I try to avoid my sister-in-law in the morning so that I can focus on my family and business.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I enjoy baking for my nieces and nephews.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I remember falling asleep in the back of my dad's pickup truck on the way to the beach.

content.text: Hi there!  What are you up to today?
Hello! Not much. I am getting ready to go to work. What are you doing today?
I am at work too. I am writing some short films.
That's awesome! I love watching short films. Do you post them online?
Yes, I do. I have a youtube channel where I post them.
Cool! What is your channel name? I would love to check it out.
My channel name is "short films by me".
Thanks! I will check it out later.
No problem. What do you do for work?
I own a small business. I sell comic books.
That's awesome! I collect comic books too.
That's great! I am a bit of a klutz so I am always dropping them.
Hahaha! That's funny. I am always breaking them too.
It's a good thing they are so cheap!
I am glad we met. It's nice to talk to someone who likes the same things I do.
Me too! It's nice to meet you too
